verses.verse: Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3426>there<s%> was <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> are you <S%H7200>staring<s%> at one another?"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> [some] for us from that <S%H8033>place,<s%> so that we may <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
Then <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H1250>grain<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> did not <S%H7971>send<s%> Joseph's <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am afraid that <S%H611>harm<s%> may <S%H7122>befall<s%> him."

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H7666>grain<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> those who were <S%H935>coming,<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> [also.]

Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was the <S%H7989>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> he was the one who <S%H7666>sold<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> And Joseph's <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to him with [their] <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> he <S%H5234>recognized<s%> them, but he <S%H9330>disguised<s%> himself to them and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them <S%H7186>harshly.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H370>"Where<s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> from?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>"
But <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H5234>recognized<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> although they did not <S%H5234>recognize<s%> him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2492>had<s%> about them, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You are <S%H7270>spies;<s%> you have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H6172>undefended<s%> <S%H6172>parts<s%> of our <S%H776>land.<s%>"
Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3808>"No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> but your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>
"We are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> we are <S%H9210>honest<s%> <S%H9210>men,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are not <S%H7270>spies.<s%>"
Yet he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3808>"No,<s%> but you have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H6172>undefended<s%> <S%H6172>parts<s%> of our <S%H776>land!<s%>"

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> [in all,] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H9512>youngest<s%> is with our father <S%H1>today,<s%> and <S%H3117>one<s%> is <S%H259>no<s%> <S%H369>more.<s%>"
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "It is as I <S%H1696>said<s%> to you, you are <S%H7270>spies;<s%>

by <S%H2088>this<s%> you will be <S%H974>tested:<s%> by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> place <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> your <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H2008>here!<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of you that he may <S%H3947>get<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> while you remain <S%H631>confined,<s%> that your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H974>tested,<s%> whether there is <S%H571>truth<s%> in you. But <S%H518>if<s%> not, by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> you are <S%H7270>spies.<s%>"
So he <S%H622>put<s%> them <S%H622>all<s%> <S%H622>together<s%> in <S%H4929>prison<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> and <S%H2421>live,<s%> for I <S%H3372>fear<s%> God: <S%H430><s%>

<S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H9210>honest<s%> <S%H9210>men,<s%> let <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> be <S%H631>confined<s%> in your <S%H1004>prison<s%><S%H4929>;<s%> but as for [the rest of] you, <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>households,<s%>

and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to me, so your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H539>verified,<s%> and you will not <S%H4191>die.<s%> "And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H61>"Truly<s%> we are <S%H818>guilty<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> our <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6869>distress<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%> when he <S%H2603>pleaded<s%> with us, yet we would not <S%H8085>listen;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6869>distress<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> upon us."

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Did I not <S%H559>tell<s%> you, 'Do not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3206>boy<s%>'; and you would not <S%H8085>listen<s%>? <S%H1571>Now<s%> <S%H2009><s%> <S%H1875>comes<s%> the <S%H1875>reckoning<s%> for his <S%H1818>blood.<s%>"
They did not <S%H3045>know,<s%> however, that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8085>understood,<s%> for there was an <S%H9238>interpreter<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.

And he <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>away<s%> from them and <S%H1058>wept.<s%> But when he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to them and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them, he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> from them and <S%H631>bound<s%> him before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H6680>orders<s%> to <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H3627>bags<s%> with <S%H1250>grain<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> man's <S%H3701>money<s%> in his <S%H8242>sack,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H6720>provisions<s%> for the <S%H1870>journey.<s%> And <S%H3651>thus<s%> it was <S%H6213>done<s%> for them.
So they <S%H5375>loaded<s%> their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> with their <S%H7668>grain,<s%> and <S%H1980>departed<s%> from <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And as <S%H259>one<s%> [of them] <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H8242>sack<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H4554>fodder<s%> at the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> <S%H4411>place,<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H3701>money;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "My <S%H3701>money<s%> has been <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H1571>even<s%> in my <S%H572>sack.<s%>" And their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3318>sank,<s%> and they [turned] <S%H2729>trembling<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to us?"

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to their father <S%H1>Jacob<s%> in the <S%H3290>land<s%> of <S%H776>Canaan,<s%> they <S%H3667>told<s%> him <S%H5046>all<s%> that had <S%H3605>happened<s%> to them, <S%H7136>saying,<s%>
"The <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7186>harshly<s%> with us, and <S%H5414>took<s%> us for <S%H7270>spies<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>
"But we <S%H559>said<s%> to him, 'We are <S%H9210>honest<s%> <S%H9210>men;<s%> we are not <S%H7270>spies.<s%>

'We are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of our father; <S%H1>one<s%> is <S%H259>no<s%> <S%H369>more,<s%> and the <S%H369>youngest<s%> is with our father <S%H9512>today<s%> in the <S%H1>land<s%> of <S%H3117>Canaan.<s%>'

"And the <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to us, 'By <S%H2088>this<s%> I shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H9210>honest<s%> <S%H9210>men:<s%> <S%H5117>leave<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> with me and <S%H3947>take<s%> [grain for] the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and <S%H1980>go.<s%>

'But <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to me that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are not <S%H7270>spies,<s%> but <S%H9210>honest<s%> <S%H9210>men.<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> to you, and you may <S%H5503>trade<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>' "

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as they were <S%H9553>emptying<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks,<s%> that <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> man's <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> [was] in his <S%H8242>sack;<s%> and when they and their father <S%H1>saw<s%> their <S%H7200>bundles<s%> of <S%H6872>money,<s%> they were <S%H3701>dismayed.<s%>

And their father <S%H1>Jacob<s%> <S%H3290>said<s%> to them, "You have <S%H559>bereaved<s%> me of my <S%H7921>children:<s%> <S%H7921>Joseph<s%> is <S%H3130>no<s%> <S%H369>more,<s%> and <S%H369>Simeon<s%> is <S%H8095>no<s%> <S%H369>more,<s%> and you would <S%H369>take<s%> <S%H3947>Benjamin;<s%> <S%H1144>all<s%> these things are <S%H3605>against<s%> me."

Then <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his father, <S%H1>saying,<s%> "You may <S%H559>put<s%> my <S%H4191>two<s%> <S%H8147>sons<s%> to <S%H1121>death<s%> <S%H4191>if<s%> I do not <S%H518>bring<s%> him [back] to you; <S%H935>put<s%> him in my <S%H5414>care,<s%> and I will <S%H3027>return<s%> him to you."

But Jacob <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with you; for his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and he <S%H905>alone<s%> is <S%H7604>left.<s%> If <S%H611>harm<s%> should <S%H7122>befall<s%> him on the <S%H1870>journey<s%> you are <S%H1980>taking,<s%> then you will <S%H3381>bring<s%> my <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>hair<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> in <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>"
